<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Policy name="dc=amconfig^^AgentLogging" createdby="uid=dsameuser" lastmodifiedby="uid=dsameuser" creationdate="1656319218197" lastmodifieddate="1656319218197" referralPolicy="false" active="true" >
<Rule name="delegation-rule1">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://*dc=amconfig/iPlanetAMLoggingService/1.0/application/*" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="MODIFY" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Subjects name="Subjects" description="">
<Subject name="AuthenticatedAgents" type="AuthenticatedAgents" includeType="inclusive">
</Subject>
</Subjects>
</Policy>
